ComicInfo.Summary:
All three tales in American Mythology's drive-in theater triple-feature of fright come to horrifying conclusions in this throwback to the glory days of horror anthology comics! These modern takes on the classic characters of the werewolf, the mummy, and the Frankenstein monster will have you glued to your seat and trembling with fear, all brought to you by a stellar, international cast of creators. Don't dare miss the thrills and chills of Parts, Safiya, and The Bite, all presented in glorious black and white that enhances the feeling of devastating dread on each blood-soaked page! American Mythology Monsters is available in two covers - Standard and Racy by Mike Wolfer.
